text: Teach Yourself Scheme in Fixnum Days is an introductory book by Dorai Sitaram on the Scheme programming language using the Racket Scheme implementation. It is intended as a quick-start guide for novices. It works as a concise tutorial of the Scheme language. The text is outdated in several parts, including its introduction to macros using an unhygienic macro system. == External links == *Book homepage == References == Category:Scheme (programming language)
title: Teach Yourself Scheme in Fixnum Days
